DESCRIPTION: Deals #b50% more damage to targets with #yLock-On.
TBD for Augment mechanic
Resource used to #yUpgrade #yOrbs and #yOverclock cards.
Increases the base stats of cards by #b25% until played.
Gain #yRecoil when this card is played, making your next attack deal #b50% less damage.
This card cannot be #yOverclocked.
Move the most recent cards in your discard pile to your hand.
Provides #yBlock at the end of your turn. Receiving unblocked attack damage reduces Plated Armor by #b1.
Whenever you would lose HP, lose #b4 less and reduce Protect by #b1. NL When depleted, you become #yScrambled and draw #b1 less card next turn.
Your next attack deals #b50% less damage.
At the beginning of your next turn, add the selected cards to your hand. Will not recover cards which are exhausted or otherwise removed from play.
Loaded cards become Reloading when played. NL Reloading cards are #yUnplayable and become Loaded when #yDiscarded or #yRight #yClicked at the cost of [E]
Shuffle this card into your draw pile when it is played.
This card returns to your hand when played.
Draw #b1 less card next turn.
When receiving #yAttack damage, deals damage back. NL At the start of your turn, lose Spikes if you were attacked.
Damage scales with #ySpikes.
Other debuffs can not decrease while #yStasis is active.
A stunned enemy does nothing this turn.
#yRight #yClick to swap the effect of this card.
Upgrading Orbs makes them more powerful. Orbs can be upgraded any number of times.
Orb: Deals damage to the enemy with the lowest HP when you play an Attack. When #yEvoked, deals damage and applies #yLock-On to a random enemy.
Orb: Stores damage when attacked. When #yEvoked, deals damage to the enemy with the highest HP.
Orb: Grants #yBlock when #yEvoked and when you play an Attack.
Orb: Deals damage when you are attacked. When #yEvoked, grants #ySpikes.
